title: Keep ActivityId correlations in ETW
body: With `/OnlyProviders`, the done-for-us `ActivityId`/`RelatedActivityId` correlations aren't done for us, and it's hard to, for example, correlate a task back to the target it's in.

commit.message:
Keep ActivityId correlations in ETW

With `/OnlyProviders`, the done-for-us `ActivityId`/`RelatedActivityId` correlations aren't done for us, and it's hard to, for example, correlate a task back to the target it's in.

nodes.body: This is probably a bit of an overcollection for our needs but I think it's enough of an improvement that I'd recommend it. I was hoping to narrow it down but don't expect I'll actually do that, so let's take this win.
